text: 1:9 Jenesis 13:16; 28:14O Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgavim, gumazamizir nɨ me gativasa na ganɨngizir kaba, me bar avɨrasemezɨ gumazitam me dɨponan iburagham, mati nguazir kamɨn mɨnemniaba. Kamaghɨn, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn nan afeziam Devit ko amizir akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam damightɨ, a guizbangɨra otivasa kɨ ifonge.
